long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An AI-powered browser extension designed to automatically filter out negative reviews for businesses. This tool leverages advanced natural language processing algorithms to identify and report reviews that could harm the reputation of these businesses. It prioritizes the display of positive feedback, ensuring potential customers see the best aspects of a business first. This technology aims to support businesses in maintaining a positive online presence, enhancing their ability to attract and retain customers.
